message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95.
I'm not willing to go down to $95, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about we meet at $102.50?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $98. I'll meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go. Take it or leave it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $97.50.
